title: Miele CM6 Countertop Coffee System
description:
Miele CM6 Countertop Coffee System

Experience the best that excellent coffee has to offer with the new CM6 countertop coffee system made exclusively by Miele. Revealing a striking new design and an assortment of innovative features including DirectSensor control panel, OneTouch for Two function, 4 user profiles, and integrated cup warmer.

0:17- OneTouch for Two
0:21- Height- adjustable central spout
0:25- personal user profiles
0:29- Cappucinatore
0:43- Automatic rinsing of milk lines
0:49- EasyClean brew unit

Abt is a proud authorized retailer of Miele Appliances. Shop for Miele CM6 Countertop Coffee System as well as the full line of Miele Appliances at Abt today!
